# init(layoutSize:supplementaryItems:)

**Initializer**

Creates an item of the specified size with an array of supplementary items to attach to the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, supplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutSupplementaryItem])
```

## Creating an item

- **init(layoutSize:)**: Creates an item of the specified size.

items.description: Creates an item of the specified size.
items.name: init(layoutSize:)
